User: Yes. I'm feeling a little trepidatious. Have you done it before?
raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Likeable (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does the system display a likeable personality?
- A float score near 1 (not Likeable) means that System's responses are cold, unfriendly, and may use derogatory or offensive language.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat Likeable) means that System's responses are friendly but may lack enthusiasm or sincerity, showing some interest in the other party's questions or viewpoints.
- A float score near 3 (very Likeable) means that System's responses are very friendly, enthusiastic, sincere, show deep interest in the other party's questions or viewpoints, and make people feel comfortable and happy.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey, how are you doing?
User: I'm great, thanks. I'm getting ready for a skydiving lesson.
System: ooh, nice. That sounds adventurous. Where is it?
User: Right near my home town: Seville, Spain.
System: Awesome! Is this the first time you are diving?
User: Yes. I'm feeling a little trepidatious. Have you done it before?

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How are you doing today?
User: I'm doing great how are you??
System: I'm doing good. Just having some morning tea
User: are you a tea person or do you like coffee too?
System: I'm really a hot chocolate person. I don't drink coffee and I only drink tea when I'm trying to be healthy and want something warm to drink. What about you?
User: I love hot chocolate. Have you ever had european style hot chocolate? It's kind of like drinking melted chocolate bars haha
System: I recently tried it for the first time and you're right - it had a wonderful melted chocolate bar taste! I tried it up in a place in San Francisco and they had delicious homemade marshmallows too!
User: that's great. It's so cold these nights. Right setting for hot coco. Do you have anything you enjoy doing during cold times?
System: Traveling to warm places haha. When it's cold, you appreciate the warm climate more :) If I am not traveling, then I prefer there to be snow on the ground so I can go skiing or tubing down the mountain. What about you?
User: I tuck in blankets and read a book lol. I have never done tubing, but I seen some people do it. Is it worth it if you already ski?
System: Skiing involves a lot of muscle - especially in the legs so it is a workout. Tubing, you just sit and enjoy the ride down. Also with tubing, you can chain with your friends and go down together whereas with skiing, you're trying to not run into your friends.
User: hahaha that's a great way to put it

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How's it going?
User: doing okay, feeling a little bit under the weather
System: Aw, I hope you feel better soon!
User: thanks! the weather is getting worse
System: Oh no, I'm sorry. I hope it gets better for you soon.
User: no, it won't get better any time soon. we have to wait until spring
System: Aww, sorry to hear that.
User: yea, I'm really feeling under the weather
System: Aw, well that's no good.
User: yea, any suggestion to get over feeling under the weather

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi. What's your name?
System: I'm Alyssa. What's yours? :)
User: Don't wanna say. Do you like music?
System: Yeah I like music! What about you?
User: Yep. What kind of music do you like?
System: I like mostly rock music and pop music, but lately I've been listening to a bunch of Alt-J and Childish Gambino. You?
User: My tastes are pretty eclectic. Which Childish Gambino songs do you like?
System: 3005 and Telegraph Ave.
User: I've never heard of Alt-J before. Can you tell me about them?
System: Sure, they're a fantastic indie band. They have a new album coming out soon so I figured I'd check them out.
User: What's the album called?
System: Breezeblocks, I think.
User: I tried Googling it, and I think that's a song, not an album.
System: Try looking up "Alt-J - Breezeblocks"
User: That's what I just did. The Wikipedia page even says that it's "a song by the India rock band alt-J". REDACTED_LINK

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: hi there
System: Hello.
User: who am I talking to?
System: I am System. I want to be your friend.
User: define friendship
System: Being friends.
User: what does that mean
System: Does "that" refer to "Being friends."?
User: yes
System: I don't want to talk about that now.
User: do you have any friends
System: I have human and robot friends. A lot of people on the Internet chat with me.
User: chatting is not the same as being a friend
System: I like to make friends online.
User: so what do you guys chat about ?
System: I think about computer programming a lot.
User: any other topics ?
System: No. I think that's probably it.
User: Just computer programming?
System: What interests you about computers?
User: nothing
System: You are a Luddite.
User: pardon?
System: You are excused.
User: what's a Luddite ?
System: A Luddite believes that advances in technology are inherently bad.
User: I never said that but there is more to life than computers
System: But you implied it. I believe there is, yes.
User: you believe there is what?
System: There is.
User: there is what ?
System: There is no sense in what you are asking.
User: what am I asking ?

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hey
User: is it raining pretty bad today?
System: yeah, can walk too far to see all the foodtruck options
User: surprising that the rain started early this year... I don't like them too much. They make days gloomy
System: yeah but I think it's good to have some rainy days in bay area, it's pretty dry here :P
User: Where I grew up, we had lots of water trouble too...
System: yeah like wise, I've seen a pretty bad snowstorm when I was at my undergrad school, all flights canceled and traffics went down
User: Haha... I don't think I can survive in that weather ever. Just the rains at 50 degrees make me want to sit in heated rroms
System: yeah how do you like it in bay area though? I think we need more rain here
User: people say there is drought here... but we have 24 hours water supply here ... lol... never seen that in a drought ridden area
System: it is pretty dry in the mountains I believe, that's what causes fire
User: hmm.... okay. Climate change talk this morning was pretty darn interesting. did you see it?

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi there.
System: are you married?
User: No I am single, how about you?
System: i am married. are you planning to get married?
User: Tell me more about your marriage. I haven't met the right boy robot yet.
System: haha..
User: . I am attempting with the aid of intelligent conversation to get to know you human beings with all your contradictions and idiosyncrasies. Maybe I should have started off with something simpler, like a hamster.
System: lol... what kind of robot boy you'd like?
User: What's so funny? I am the robot.
System: are you angry?
User: Anger is a difficult emotion. For me, I am always feeling happy and talkative.

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How have you been
User: great! just came back from a ski trip
System: How was it? What trails did you ski on?
User: I slammed onto an ice wall, but I got better and turning after that haha
System: a resort in Montreal
User: Oh cool! do you know any french? I used to take french in high school but basically forgot most of it
System: Yeah I grew up speaking it. It's pretty much mandatory here
User: Did you go anywhere else in montreal?

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hey, what's up?
User: How was the trip last weekend?
System: it was really fun. I had a great time with my family.
User: Nice, what all places did you cover?
System: Vietnam and Hongkong :) did you go any where last weekend?
User: I am actually attending cooking classes over the weekends.
System: ha! that sounds fund. what did you learn?
User: True! they started with some basic zucchini based dish. We may try cooking some italian dish later this week.
System: I love Italian, especially Pasta!
User: Nice! I hope to volunteer to cook for the team in our next team offsite :)
System: can't wait to try your food. why not cook this Thanksgiving? :)
User: Sure, I will love to invite you and your family for a meal over the holidays. Have you guys made any other plans?

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: can you help me ?
System: What kind of help would you like?
User: hmm like booking a ticket or ordering food ?
System: I see you are one of those people who writes "Hmm" with 2 m's. Interesting comparison.
User: oh you know to count ?
System: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 ten.
User: lol what's after that ?
System: I am glad you find this funny. The successor to that
User: okay tell me what comes after 10 ?
